message.content:
cs.LG, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.DC, cs.MA 

This paper involves the use of deep reinforcement learning for computation offloading in a mobile edge computing system, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). It also deals with networked systems (cs.NI) and control systems (cs.SY) as it involves optimizing the allocation of resources in a multi-user system. Additionally, it involves distributed computing (cs.DC) as the offloading policies are learned independently at each mobile user. Finally, it may also fall under the category of multi-agent systems (cs.MA) as each mobile user is considered as an agent in the system.
